    • Method Detail

      • createPopulation

        public static Population createPopulation(Config config)
        Creates a new Population container. Population instances need a Config, because they need to know about the modes of transport.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration which is used to create the Population.
        Returns:
        the new Population instance

      • createPopulation

        public static Population createPopulation(Config config,
                                          Network network)
        Creates a new Population container which, depending on configuration, may make use of the specified Network instance to store routes more efficiently.
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration which is used to create the Population.
        network - the Network to which Plans in this Population will refer.
        Returns:
        the new Population instance

      • equalPopulation

        public static boolean equalPopulation(Population s1,
                                      Population s2)
        Compares two Populations by serializing them to XML with the current writer and comparing their XML form byte by byte. A bit like comparing checksums of files, but regression tests won't fail just because the serialization changes. Limitation: If one of the PopulationWriters throws an Exception, this will go unnoticed (this method will just return true or false, probably false, except if both Writers have written the exact same text until the Exception happens).

      • createLeg

        public static Leg createLeg(Leg leg)
        Makes a deep copy of this leg, however only when the Leg has a route which is instance of Route or BasicRoute. Other route instances are not considered.

        • Is the statement about the route still correct? kai, jun'16
        Parameters:
        leg -

      • removeLeg

        public static void removeLeg(Plan plan,
                             int index)
        Removes the specified leg and the following act, too! If the following act is not the last one, the following leg will be emptied to keep consistency (i.e. for the route)
        Parameters:
        index -

      • removeActivity

        public static void removeActivity(Plan plan,
                                  int index)

      • insertLegAct

        public static void insertLegAct(Plan plan,
                                int pos,
                                Leg leg,
                                Activity act)
        Inserts a leg and a following act at position pos into the plan.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position where to insert the leg-act-combo. acts and legs are both counted from the beginning starting at 0.
        leg - the leg to insert
        act - the act to insert, following the leg
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the leg and act cannot be inserted at the specified position without retaining the correct order of legs and acts.
